code: import React from"react";import{Chart,CategoryScale,LinearScale,PointElement,LineElement,Title,Tooltip,Legend,Filler}from"chart.js";import{Line}from"react-chartjs-2";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";Chart.register(CategoryScale,LinearScale,PointElement,LineElement,Title,Tooltip,Legend,Filler);var Charts=function Charts(props){var options={responsive:true,plugins:{legend:{display:false,position:"top"},title:{display:false,text:"Chart.js Line Chart"}}};var labels=props.data;var data={labels:labels,datasets:[{label:"Dataset 1",backgroundColor:"#94c720",fill:true,data:props.label}]};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Line,{options:options,data:data});};export default Charts;
